value.verse:
Hallelujah!
Praise the LORD, O my soul! *
value.halfverse:
I will praise the LORD as long as I live;
 I will sing praises to my God while I have my being.
for there is no help in them.
value.verse: Put not your trust in rulers, nor in any child of earth, *
When they breathe their last, they return to earth, *
value.halfverse: and in that day their thoughts perish.
whose hope is in the LORD their God;
value.verse: Happy are they who have the God of Jacob for their help! *

value.halfverse: who keeps his promise for ever;
value.verse: Who made heaven and earth, the seas, and all that is in them; *

value.halfverse: and food to those who hunger.
value.verse: Who gives justice to those who are oppressed, *

The LORD sets the prisoners free;
the LORD opens the eyes of the blind; *
value.halfverse: the LORD lifts up those who are bowed down;

value.verse:
The LORD loves the righteous;
the LORD cares for the stranger; *
value.halfverse:
he sustains the orphan and widow,
 but frustrates the way of the wicked.

your God, O Zion, throughout all generations.
 Hallelujah!
value.verse: The LORD shall reign for ever, *
